title: FOR SALE: Superb Fairway Apartment
details:
A rare opportunity to invest in the ever-popular Fairway Residencies.

Offered fully furnished and covering 1700 sq.ft., the apartment includes: 3 Bedrooms (1 Ensuite), Guest Bathroom, Sitting & Dining Room, Open-plan Kitchen, Rear Pantry, Maid’s Quarters, Balcony, and Car Parking Space.

Fairway residents also benefit from access to the condominium’s excellent Swimming Pool, Gym, Function Room and Garden.

Early viewing is highly recommended.

Website: www.britbrokers.com
